db:execute-ddl.doc:name: Copy_of_Execute DDL
db:execute-ddl.db:sql: CREATE TABLE Orders ( Id INT NOT NULL, CustomerID VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, EmployeeID VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, OrderDate DATE NOT NULL, RequiredDate DATE, ShippedDate DATE, Via INT, Freight DECIMAL, Name VARCHAR(255), Address VARCHAR(255), City VARCHAR(255), Region VARCHAR(255), PostalCode VARCHAR(255), Country VARCHAR(2), PRIMARY KEY (Id) )

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { OrderID: payload01.ID, CustomerID: payload01.CUSTOMERID, EmployeeID: payload01.EMPLOYEEID, OrderDate: payload01.ORDERDATE, RequiredDate: payload01.REQUIREDDATE, ShippedDate: payload01.SHIPPEDDATE, ShipVia: payload01.VIA, Freight: payload01.FREIGHT, ShipName: payload01.NAME, ShipAddress: payload01.ADDRESS, ShipCity: City: payload01.CITY, ShipRegion: payload01.REGION, ShipPostalCode: payload01.POSTALCODE, ShipCountry: payload01.COUNTRY }

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Order
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[%dw 2.0 import * from dw::core::Strings --- { "id": payload.OrderID, "cid": payload.CustomerID, "eid": payload.EmployeeID, "odate": substring(payload.OrderDate, 0, 10), "rdate": substring(payload.RequiredDate, 0, 10), "sdate": substring(payload.ShippedDate, 0, 10), "via": payload.Via, "fr": payload.Freight, "name": payload.ShipName, "add": payload.ShipAddress, "post": payload.ShipPostalCode, "city": payload.ShipCity, "reg": payload.ShipRegion, "cntry": payload.ShipCountry }]
